description: Adversaries may abuse msiexec.exe to proxy the execution of malicious payloads
name: Suspicious MsiExec Embedding Parent
query: ((process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\cmd.exe) AND process.parent.command_line:*MsiExec.exe* AND process.parent.command_line:*\-Embedding\ *) AND (NOT ((process.executable:*\:\\Windows\\System32\\cmd.exe AND process.command_line:*C\:\\Program\ Files\\SplunkUniversalForwarder\\bin\\*))))
author: frack113
